ComicInfo.Characters: Leopold Kurtz (death),Ilsa Haupstein,Abe Sapien (cameo),Prof. Dr. Herman von Klempt,Dr. Kate Corrigan (cameo),other BPRD personnel [Bureau of Paranormal Research and Defense],Grigori Rasputin,Dr. Karl Ruprect Kroenen,Hecate,Koku (introduction),Hellboy,Dr. Tom Manning,Clark (cameo)
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T18:36:18 [Issue ID 4000-42761] urn:comicvine:4000-42761 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 10:42:44. [Issue ID 59238]
ComicInfo.Summary:
Wake the Devil [Chapter Four]: Hellboy's battle with Hecate ends just as Castle Giurescu blows up good, the explosion seen by Abe and Clark from a distance. The Baba Yaga's aide Koku presents Rasputin with an iron maiden that Ilsa enters at his urging. Kurtz attacks Von Klempt and is killed by Kroenen. Villagers take an unconscious Hellboy from the castle's rubble to a crossroads, where he is met by Rasputin.
Silent as the Grave [Part 4]: "Pass Not the Portal of the Sunset Land! Pause Where the Angels at Their Vigil Stand. Be Warned! And Press Not, Though the Gates Lie Wide. But Rest Securely on the Hither Side.": Investigating at Julia Adler's house, Benedict is attacked by disembodied hands, then finds an unsettled Sunset and the spirit of of silent-screen star Daphne Dumont. The ghost tells of how her husband, Oakum McGrew, framed her for his murder; a zombified McGrew then attacks Benedict.
ComicInfo.Teams: Project Ragna Rok,Bureau for Paranormal Research and Defense
ComicInfo.Title: Wake the Devil [Chapter Four]; Silent as the Grave [Part 4]: "Pass Not the Portal of the Sunset Land! Pause Where the Angels at Their Vigil Stand. Be Warned! And Press Not, Though the Gates Lie Wide. But Rest Securely on the Hither Side."
